Training Egypt offers a friendly service to its visitors and members with 100's of training providers and 1000's of courses, covering 100's of subjects
The site is established as an excellent resource for employers and individuals looking for training.
Training Egypt is more than just a Internet based business our friendly team are there at the end of the phone if you need to discuss your training and development requirements.

تريننج ايجيبت هو موقع و بوابة للتدريب في مصر وليس شركة تدريب. وهو موقع متخصص في عرض شركات التدريب و ايضا الدورات والبرامج التدريبية للشركات المعتمدة . و ايضا هو موقع تفاعلي اجتماعي يمكن الزوار و تقييم تجربتهم مع الشركات و طرح اسئله مباشرة للشركات و المدربين

posts.message: Very nice presentation recording and slides. The driver is very interesting, pretty clean and truly well thought. One thing to note though is that we're back to separating storage concerns from model aspects. What you see is another mapper like ORMs, except the storage happens to be not exactly relational.
